channel.title: 525, how to change the ip?
channel.description: hello. i just downloaded a 525 client for my server. but how to change the IP on it, so it runs on my ip. and how to change the Client name in top, when you open it?

item.title: 525, how to change the ip?
item.dc:creator: @Ye_Im_Ace Ye Im Ace
item.description:
@Ye_Im_Ace wrote:

[quote=“Jack0wnz, post:1, topic:323571”]hello. i just downloaded a 525 client for my server. but how to change the IP on it, so it runs on my ip.
and how to change the Client name in top, when you open it?[/quote]
If it’s 508 loading 525 cache, try Loader.java and Class68_sub20_sub15.

If it’s a normal 525, then try client.java and client2.java i think, Can’t remember. i’ll find out for you if it’s not that anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: 525, how to change the ip?
item.dc:creator: @mr_expert4 mr expert4
item.description:
@mr_expert4 wrote:

[quote=“jokezta, post:3, topic:323571”]to change the ip, you must go to the client, and find the files and find the file called GUI, open it in notepad and either do:

  1. ctrl+f and type in the clients current ip (the one you want to change)
  2. (im not sure if this works with all clients) ctrl+f and type server ip
    then change it, compile and bam… ther ya go.[/quote] Isn’t a 317…

Read full topic

item.title: 525, how to change the ip?
item.dc:creator: @jokezta jokezta
item.description:
@jokezta wrote:

to change the ip, you must go to the client, and find the files and find the file called GUI, open it in notepad and either do:

  1. ctrl+f and type in the clients current ip (the one you want to change)
  2. (im not sure if this works with all clients) ctrl+f and type server ip
    then change it, compile and bam… ther ya go.

Read full topic

item.title: 525, how to change the ip?
item.dc:creator: @jordanmoore jordanmoore
item.description:
@jordanmoore wrote:

Hi,

I’m new to clients but I think that the file you need is ‘client.java’.

Then search something like ‘43594’ and that port is usually located right next to where the server is.

As for changing the title that may also be in here but i’m not sure on that part.

Read full topic
